name: Aussie's 2d Shooter
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project.

Modifications :

Level one : Have A chaser enemy follow the player while diagonal enemy and straight shooter stay idle 

Level two : Add two additional enemies. Have all enemies chase and shoot player

Level three : Total of 10 enemies. have first 5 at the beginning , 2 straight shooters in the middle, and one diagonal enemy to defeat at the very top.

Credits : Brian Winn, Michigan State University

Created by : Austin Sing
